name: An orphan and a crow
description:
Features : An Orphan And A Crow : - Awesome Sound Effects to Double your emotion, Feel Free From Your Depression From Being Sad, Say Goodbye to Sadness, loneliness & welcome Happiness. - Amazing UI and Game Art to Heal your Depression and Sadness. - Crow as a Companion & Can Customize Your Companion even environment. - Awesome Graphics, Game Art, Sound etc, - Customize Your Character according to World of Depression. - Play According to Your Mood : Sad Mood, Happy Mood , Depressed Mood Even in Goodbye Mood Too.

Last Goodbye was really painful. It happens to Crow sometime. it just that his soul is disturbed somehow or he did something worse which his soul is resisting. Once the soul lost happiness , it's hard to find from the outside world. Sad Soul didn't feel anything because he is trying to be strong and want to feel the reason of the sadness of his soul.

The Sad Soul(Aatma, atma) can be compared to ignorant child who enjoy sweets only and hate chilies but he was not aware of, there is nothing exist like Happiness. Sad Soul continued his journey in the search of his lost happiness & then he met with his very Strange Friend 'Crow', who will help him to cross Dark Jungle. Can he survive the world of Darkness ? So, Continue Sad Soul story with his Friend Crow & bring peace in Jungle with his divine Powers.

Follow us on: Instagram : @threediceindia For Support write us on : vishalkawish@gmail.com
